issue.title: Missing core concept for polymorphic types

discussion.p: There is no core concept for Polymorphic types in n2572. This seems to be a useful concept where we expect dynamic_cast to return something useful.

resolution.p: Add to the synopsis of the header <concepts>:
Add the following to [concept.support], after the description of concept Class:

li.ins: Requires: for every type T that is a polymorphic class, a concept map PolymorphicClass<T> shall be implicitly defined in namespace std.
